column.Name: MaterialType
column.lookupquery: SELECT ComponentTypeID, ComponentDescription FROM pComponentType ORDER BY ComponentOrder

column.Name: A
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom14 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: P
column.lookupquery: SELECT CountryCode, CountryName FROM uCountry Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CountryName

column.Name: S
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom8 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY Custom
